ingredients: 1 cup unsalted butter, softened, 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup packed brown sugar, 1 large egg, 2 tablespoons orange juice, 1 teaspoon grated orange zest, 2   +   1/2 cups all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 teaspoon baking soda,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 cups chopped cranberries,   +   1/2 cup chopped walnuts (Optional)
nutrition: Total Fat 5g 6%, Saturated Fat 3g 13%, Cholesterol 14mg 5%, Sodium 67mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 16g 6%, Dietary Fiber 1g 2%, Total Sugars 11g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 2mg 8%, Calcium 7mg 1%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 26mg 1%
